name: Epidemic
overview: Published in Commodore User 1985/02. Alert to the Body Defense Systems! Watch out, there are some nasty germs about! Too late, Stanley has already contracted an illness. So now it's up to you, the antibody, to stamp out the germs before they reach epidemic proportions. Find and touch those germs before things get out of control. If that happens we'll have to resort to penicillin and your mission will have failed.
